It‚Äôs perfect for selecting details, sketching ideas, circling elements, or adding quick notes that require flexibility beyond preset shapes. With Free Drawing, you can visually communicate exactly what you mean in a fast, intuitive way."

### üìù How to use Free Drawing

üßæ Click the Shapes Annotation icon to access the drawing tools.

‚úèÔ∏è Right-click to enable free drawing.

‚ö° Click and drag on your Dot to sketch your custom outline, circle, or marking.

‚ö° Move, refine, or delete your drawing if you need to clarify your annotation.

üí¨ Once your drawing is placed, hover over it and Start a Thread to begin a conversation directly linked to your drawing.

### üí° Tips 

* Free Drawing is ideal for quick sketches, circling items, or adding loose visual notes.

* Keep your free drawings minimal to avoid clutter and maintain clarity in the Dot.

* Use Free Drawing for flexible annotations and Shapes for more structured ones.
